name: Steffen
description: I 2021 fullførte Steffen sin mastergrad som sivilingeniør innen Computational Engineering. Han hadde allerede fått jobb i Capgemini og her utviklet han ferdighetene sine innen back-end utvikling i .NET, front-end utvikling i React og Xamarin, samt bygget en kompetanse i skytjenesten Azure. Fra hans tidligere arbeidsgiver har Steffen erfaring fra Shipping industrien.Steffen har ikke faste hobbyer, men kan annerkjenne at mesteparten av tiden går med å tilbringe tid sammen med samboeren Ane og hunden Nero. Om det er litt tid til overs liker Steffen godt å lage mat, trene, sitte på pcen eller utforske ting han er nyskjerrig på.
haiku:
Steffen's coding dreams
Building bridges in the dark
Azure sun sets slow
summary_en:
Here is a summary of the description of Steffen in English:

Steffen completed his master's degree in Computational Engineering in 2021 and began working at Capgemini, where he developed skills in back-end development with .NET, front-end development with React and Xamarin, and gained expertise in Azure. Prior to this, he had experience in the shipping industry from his previous employer. In his free time, Steffen enjoys spending time with his partner Ane and dog Nero, and also has hobbies such as cooking, exercising, playing PC games, or exploring new interests.
